actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to liberalize the eligibility for benefits under chapter 42 of such title (relating to employment and training of disabled and Vietnam-era veterans).

summary.text: Makes a veteran entitled to disability compensation with any rating of disability (currently a rating of 30 percent or more) eligible for employment and training benefits. Eliminates the requirement that veterans of the Vietnam era apply for such benefits within 48 months of discharge or release to remain eligible.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to liberalize the eligibility for benefits under chapter 42 of such title (relating to employment and training of disabled and Vietnam-era veterans).
